context-param.description: Indicate the stage of the initialized application. Change the value of this parameter to "Production" (or remove parameter) when leaving development/testing phase

The resource optimization feature provides optimized component dependencies - JavaScript, CSS - which are compressed and aggregated to resource packages. The loading of compressed resource packages may lead into significant client performance boost, since many small files are aggregated into one big file - the number of HTTP connections necessary to download application resources is significantly decreased.

Use the richfaces predefined classic skin. Other predefined skins include: DEFAULT, emeraldTown, blueSky, wine, japanCherry, ruby, classic, deepMarine, and plain, which contains no skin parameters and is intended for embedding RichFaces components into existing projects with their own styles.
